## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                  | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `expanded` | `expanded`  | It `true` the component uses the whole width | `boolean` | `false` |
| `noBurger` | `no-burger` | It `true` the burger button is hidden        | `boolean` | `false` |
